title: Most popular social media sites in Norway 2019 , by platform
summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The Share of respondents of Platform Facebook is 41.5% larger than the minimum value at Tumblr.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The Share of respondents of Platform Facebook is 41.5% larger than the minimum value at Tumblr.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Platform Snapchat.
The highest Platform Facebook has 81.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Platform Tumblr.
The Platform Facebook has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Snapchat, and YouTube. Down to the Platform Tumblr which is the lowest.
Platform Pinterest, and Whatsapp have the same Share of respondents.
The Platform Tumblr tends to be 2.43 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 342.0.
